title: Amanda Iturbe
text: I am a New York City-based educator and learning specialist with over 15 years experience helping children reach their full potential. I specialize in helping upper-elementary, middle, and high school children with subject area content - including math and science - and organization skills, time management, and executive functioning.

title: Services and Contact
text:
I work with individual children and small groups for tutoring and executive functioning coaching in Lower Manhattan and many areas of Downtown Brooklyn. I believe that the best way for children to learn is through in-person interactions and, therefore, I am not taking on virtual clients at this time.
To learn more about how I can help you and your children, as well as my rates, packages, and options, please contact me by email amanda dot iturbe at gmail dot com. I am happy to setup a 15 minute phone or zoom consultation call to discuss what options are best for you and your child.

title: Education and Work Experience
text:
I received my undergraduate degree from Hamilton College in Sociology with a minor in XXX. I then obtained my Masters degree from Simmons College in Special Education in XXX.
I have worked in school-based settings for the last 15 years…
